Package PD

package PD
  • Class
    Description
    DiceBag
    DiceBag is a Class that represents a collection of Die that have the same number of faces.
    Die
    Die is a Class that represents a Die that has a particular number of faces.
    MyFrame
    MyFrame is a Class that extends JFrame and creates a frame with the desired settings.
    MyPanel
    MyPanel is a Class that extends JPanel and creates a panel with the desired settings, that is, labels, text fields, a background and a button.
    NumberOfDiceRangeException
    NumberOfDiceRageException is a Class that extends Extension and creates an Exception that should be raised when the number of Dice to be rolled is smaller or equal to 0.
    NumberOfFacesRangeException
    NumberOfFacesRageException is a Class that extends Extension and creates an Exception that should be raised when the number of Faces of the Dice to be rolled is smaller or equal to 0.
